message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think it's fair to split it evenly, but I'm willing to take a little less to get things moving.
Let's try to be a bit more reasonable. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share, but I'd like to see a bit more compromise from you.
I've come down a bit, it's time for you to meet me halfway
We're getting close to the end, and we both stand to lose a lot if we don't agree. I think an even split is the fairest and most sensible solution at this point.
